title: A New Game of Thrones Play Coming Soon
summary: A new play called Game of Thrones: The Mad King will open in Stratford-upon-Avon this summer. It is based on the popular fantasy series Game of Thrones. The Royal Shakespeare Company (RSC) is making the play with help from HBO, the TV network. The story happens 10 years before the books and TV show, telling an original tale from author George RR Martin. Tickets will go on sale in April at the Royal Shakespeare Theatre. The play is about a tournament where families gather, but there is a secret plot against the Mad King. It explores themes like family, power, and survival in a magical live setting.

background_read: Game of Thrones is a famous fantasy series with books and a TV show about kingdoms, dragons, and battles. Shakespeare was a great writer from England whose plays inspire many stories today. A play is a live performance where actors tell a story on stage, often in theaters. Stratford-upon-Avon is a historic town known as Shakespeare's birthplace, making it a special place for new plays.
Article_Structure: WHO: The Royal Shakespeare Company, HBO, George RR Martin, Duncan Macmillan, and Dominic Cooke are involved in making the play.
WHAT: A new play called Game of Thrones: The Mad King, set before the original series, about a tournament and a plot against the Mad King.
WHERE: It will open at the Royal Shakespeare Theatre in Stratford-upon-Avon, England.
WHY: To tell an original story from George RR Martin in a live theater setting, inspired by Shakespeare and exploring themes of power and survival.

perspectives.description: The play connects modern fantasy with Shakespeare's legacy, showing how old stories can inspire new ones in theater.
